title: Studios and One Bedroom  Ready to move in!!
posting_body: ['move in by or before August 15th and get $500 off your moving costs.', 'The Harmon at 370 Apartments in Las Vegas, NV.', 'Enjoy life with easy access to transportation, shopping, entertainment, and City Center.', 'Choose from two very efficient apartment floor plans,  ready for you to move in.', 'We have an amazing pool and fitness center coming soon .', 'The Harmon at 370 Apartments is right where you want to be, centrally located and in the center of everything Las Vegas.', 'Give us a call, schedule a tour online, or stop in today for your personal tour.', 'Se Habla Espanol', '-Non-Smoking', '-Bathtub with shower', '-Carpet / Vinyl Flooring', '-Professional Management', '-Two Oversized Resort Style Swimming Pools', '-Refrigerator with Freezer', '-Vertical Blind Window Coverings', '-Clothes Care Center', '-Electric Oven / Range', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
